title: Adore You (Miley Cyrus Vs Cedric Gervais Radio Edit)
description:
Adore You (Miley Cyrus Vs Cedric Gervais Radio Edit)

Comment below the EDM songs,podcasts,mixes,etc you want and I will try to upload it.
Please rate and Seed.

Artist(s) : Miley Cyrus Vs Cedric Gervais
Album : Adore You (Miley Cyrus Vs Cedric Gervais Radio Edit) - Single
Genre : Progressive House
Year : 2014
Audio Bit Rate : 320 kbps

Miley Cyrus' first two "Bangerz" singles ruled the charts with quite an easy, however, it's a different story for single #3, the R&B-esque ballad "Adore You". It's not a flop, but it's definitely struggling to be a hit. As of this post, the Oren Yoel-produced track is finding difficult to crack the Top 20 on the Billboard Hot 100 and the Top 10 on iTunes. The single clearly needs help. The problem probably relies on the song lack of pop "edge", that's why RCA and Miley have called French DJ Cedric Gervais for assistance. He's the man responsible for making Lana del Rey's "Summertime Sadness" a resonant hit all around the world with her EDM remix. And now, he's given Miley's "Adore You" that "commercial", "party" edge the R&B-esque balad was probably requiring to "explode".
